element_text:
Investments in group enterprises have been recognised
according to the equity method, so that the investment is
measured at the pro rata share of the group enterprises'
net asset value adjusted for internal dividends and gains.
Foreign group enterprises' profit or loss and equity have
been translated into DKK. Exchange adjustments arising
on translation of the foreign group enterprises' equity at
the beginning of the financial year as well as profit/loss
for the financial year are taken to equity.
